--- template: index.html ---

options.prototype

Methods and properties that should be available on the element instance. This behaves just like any prototype object does. All methods and properties are added to the element's prototype (native), or to the element instance during the created lifecycle (polyfill).

It's recommended you use the properties option for properties you're exposing through your public API, but nothing is stopping you from putting them here if you don't need the special behaviour of properties.
